name: Theme Consistency Check
description: Verify Halloween theme consistency when CSS or UI files are modified

action.message:
A UI file was modified. Please verify Halloween theme consistency:

**Color Palette:**
- Primary orange: #ff6b00
- Backgrounds: #0a0a0a, #1a0a1a, #2a0a2a
- Decision colors: #00ff88 (up), #ff3366 (down), #ffaa00 (no trade)

**Visual Effects:**
- Text shadows with orange glow
- Box shadows for atmospheric lighting
- Floating animations on button emojis

**Button Text:**
- Default: 'SUMMON PREDICTION'
- Loading: 'Summoning Spirits...'

**AI Persona:**
- 'Ghost of Wall Street' with spooky metaphors

Verify all changes maintain the Halloween theme aesthetic.
